enGB: Firebolt
zhCN: 火焰箭

enGB: You cause a bolt of fire to strike the target with a successful ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d3{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g}
zhCN: 你发射一枚火焰制成的弩箭。你必须进行一次成功的远程{g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}接触攻击{/g}. 这个{g|Encyclopedia:Spell}法术{/g}造成{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d3{/g}点{g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}火焰伤害{/g}，每2CL额外增加一个伤害骰（最高6d3）。

enGB: You cause a bolt of fire to strike the target with a successful ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d3{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g}, plus another die per two caster levels past first (maximum 6d3).
zhCN: 你发射一枚火焰制成的弩箭。你必须进行一次成功的远程{g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}接触攻击{/g}. 这个{g|Encyclopedia:Spell}法术{/g}造成{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d3{/g}点{g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}火焰伤害{/g}，每2CL额外增加一个伤害骰（最高6d3）。

enGB: Burning Touch
zhCN: 燃烧之触

enGB: You sheath your hand in fire and make a touch attack against the target. The {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d3{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g}
zhCN: 你的手中燃起火焰，对目标进行一次近战接触攻击。这个{g|Encyclopedia:Spell}法术{/g}造成{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d3{/g}点{g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}火焰伤害{/g}，每2CL额外增加一个伤害骰（最高6d3）。

enGB: You sheath your hand in fire and make a touch attack against the target. The {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g}, plus another die per two caster levels past first (maximum 6d3).
zhCN: 你的手中燃起火焰，对目标进行一次近战接触攻击。这个{g|Encyclopedia:Spell}法术{/g}造成{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d3{/g}点{g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}火焰伤害{/g}，每2CL额外增加一个伤害骰（最高6d3）。

enGB: Painful Note
zhCN: 苦痛单音

enGB: You cause a bolt of destructive resonance to strike the target with a successful ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d2{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}sonic damage{/g}
zhCN: 你发射一束破坏性的共振。你必须进行一次成功的远程{g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}接触攻击{/g}. 这个{g|Encyclopedia:Spell}法术{/g}造成{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d2{/g}点{g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}音波伤害{/g}，每2CL额外增加一个伤害骰（最高6d2）。

enGB: You cause a bolt of destructive resonance to strike the target with a successful ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d2{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}sonic damage{/g}, plus another die per two caster levels past first (maximum 6d2).

zhCN: 不谐之触
